nodes.text: Yorseg was a minor crime lord who operated out of a base on the moon of Carz. He double-crossed the crew of the freighter Smoking Blaster after first hiring them to deliver a shipment of security droid logic matrixes to Nilya Fek'ra, then setting pirates on them to steal the cargo.
In the adventure "Tales of the Smoking Blaster," Yorseg is referred to as "Yosger" on several occasions.
